citethispage-desc: Agghiunci na pàggina spiciali pî [[Special:CiteThisPage|citazzioni]] e na lijami ntâ sbarra dî strummenti
tooltip-citethispage: Nfurmazzioni pi comu citari sta pàggina
citethispage-content:
__NOTOC__
== Dittagghî bibbliugràfici pi {{FULLPAGENAME}} == * Nomu dâ pàggina: {{FULLPAGENAME}} * Auturi: Li cuntribbutura di {{SITENAME}} * Edituri: ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. * Data di l'ùrtimu canciamentu: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * Data dâ cunzurtazzioni: {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC * URL pirmanenti: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} * Còdici ID dâ virsioni dâ pàggina: {{REVISIONID}}
== Stili di citazzioni pi {{FULLPAGENAME}} == === [[Stili APA]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}. ({{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}). ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. Data dâ cunzurtazzioni {{CURRENTTIME}}, {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} di {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Stili MLA]] === "{{FULLPAGENAME}}." ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}''. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC. {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}>. === [[Stili MHRA]] === Cuntribbutura di {{SITENAME}}, '{{FULLPAGENAME}}', ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC, <{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}> [cunzurtatu lu {{CURRENTDAY}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTYEAR}}] === [[Stili Chicago]] === Cuntribbutura di {{SITENAME}}, "{{FULLPAGENAME}}," ''{{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}},'' {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (cunzurtatu lu {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === [[Stili CBE/CSE]] === Cuntribbutura di {{SITENAME}}. {{FULLPAGENAME}} [Internet]. {{SITENAME}}, {{int:sitesubtitle}}; {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTTIME}} UTC [citatu lu {{CURRENTYEAR}} {{CURRENTMONTHABBREV}} {{CURRENTDAY}}]. Dispunìbbili nta: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === [[Stili Bluebook]] === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (ùrtima vìsita lu {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Vuci [[BibTeX]] === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[N riti; cunzurtatu lu {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Si s'adòpira lu pachettu [[LaTeX]] url (mittennu \usepackage{url} a quarchi parti ntô priàmmulu), ca pruduci nnirizzi web mpagginati megghiu, si purrìa prifiriri sta virsioni: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[N riti; cunzurtatu lu {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
